item.title: Alpaca Cup
item.description: Introduction Alpaca Cup is an event management application for hosting and scoring competitions. Focus on sharing competition information (who is in each round) and live scores from judges. The Lighthouse of Amrum Event Page judge scoring.png judge scoring.png live page.png live page.png timetable page.png timetable page.png
